backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for the Valentine app.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions with OKLCH color variables and base light/dark theme settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, confetti script, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level component toggling between proposal and success views inside the shared layout.
Layout wrapper providing the pink gradient background and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/ValentineProposa: Interactive proposal screen with escalating No-button behavior, dynamic button sizing, and GIF swapping.
frontend/src/components/ValentineSuccess: Success screen displaying a celebratory GIF, final message, and triggering confetti.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Full Internet Identity context provider and hook managing login state, identity loading, and auth-client behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, and custom Valentine‑themed animations and fonts.
frontend/src/lib/confetti.ts: Provides a function that triggers a timed confetti animation using the canvas‑confetti library from the window object.
frontend/src/lib/valentineAssets.ts: Exports a constant mapping to generated Valentine‑themed image asset paths.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens sourced from CSS variables, plugins, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current scope, tech stack, features, generated assets, and architectural notes.
